creator: m.rotondi@ngi.it
text: If possible tu include .cmd file on new tomcat distribuition!

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
No, it will not be included in the Tomat distribution itself.  However, I will 
add it to the FAQ's OS/2 page which is also linked from the Wiki Useful Links 
page.
Where are the scripts, by the way?  Attach them to this Bugzilla issue please.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
jkacer@kiv.zcu.cz
text:
OS/2 scripts are linked from the FAQ page. They are physically on the Hobbes
server -- http://hobbes.nmsu.edu. For me it is not a problem since they are
reachable very easily.

I'll try to keep them up to date, don't worry :-)

OS/2 has not been supported so far because there have not been any requests from
users. I don't know how many requests is "enough".

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Please attach your scripts if you have any.  If you just want .cmd scripts and 
don't have your own to contribute, that's fine: see the FAQ's OS/2 page, and I 
will close this item.  Thanks.

Created attachment 12293
Script for tomcat run in OS/2
